## useRoute() function

Returns the current route location. Equivalent to using `$route` inside templates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useRoute(): RouteLocationNormalizedLoaded;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[RouteLocationNormalizedLoaded](./reactivuety.routelocationnormalizedloaded.md)
